Title: 'Ali Kills an Infidel who had Spat in his Face
Medium: ink and pigments on mostly laid paper
Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.623, 'Ali kills an infidel who had spat in his face.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Ibn Abi Husayn 'Ali [...] 'Ali, [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [ownsership statement plus seal on fol. 1a];Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Amir Khusraw Dihlavi (died ca. 729 AH/AD 1328)
